problem.markdown:
1. Reason for failure of insulator is _________
() Mechanical stress () Flash-over () Short circuits (x) All
2. Aluminium has _______ the resistivity of copper.
(x) 16 times () 24 times () 12 times () 3 times
3. When 1 or 2 percentage of cadmium is added to copper it __________ the tensile strength by ________ but ________ the conductivity by ________.
() Decreases, 20% , Increases, 40% () Decreases, 40% , Increases, 20% (x) Increases, 40% , decreases, 17% () Increases, 17% , decreases, 40%
4. Transmission network is commonly known as ____________
() Lock-head () Pan (x) Grid () All
5. The transmission voltage in India are _____________
() 220kV () 400kV () 132kV (x) All
problem.p: 1. Reason for failure of insulator is _________
2. Aluminium has _______ the resistivity of copper.
3. When 1 or 2 percentage of cadmium is added to copper it __________ the tensile strength by ________ but ________ the conductivity by ________.
4. Transmission network is commonly known as ____________
5. The transmission voltage in India are _____________
